Text.Name: LsDog
Text.PossibleMagic.0.Desc: Water plants causing them to mature faster. Only useable via a pet's behavior, can't be used manually.
Text.PossibleMagic.1.Desc: Exchanges one's own growth and nutrition to convert a parcel of land into Fertile Soil. \n[color=#FF0000]Must be mature to do so.[/color]
Text.PossibleMagic.2.Desc: Act Playful towards a character, using enthusiasm and charisma to break down the defenses around their heart. \n[color=#FF0000]Requires 100 Intelligence.[/color]

Text.Name: LsFox
Text.PossibleMagic.0.Desc: Heals a Disciple's Inner Injuries. Only useable via a pet's behavior, can't be used manually.
Text.PossibleMagic.1.Desc: Exchanges one's own growth and nutrition to convert a parcel of land into Spiritual Soil. \n[color=#FF0000]Must be mature to do so.[/color]
Text.PossibleMagic.2.Desc: Acts Playful with Traveling Merchant in order to curry Favor. \n [color=#FF0000] Requires 100 Intelligence.[/color]

Text.Name: LsDragon
Text.PossibleMagic.0.Desc: Heals a Disciple's Heatstroke. Only useable via a pet's behavior, can't be used manually.
Text.PossibleMagic.1.Desc: As the same type of creature as a Flood Dragon, it can dispel the Cold Prison that the Flood Dragons leave behind. \n [color=#FF0000]Must be mature to do so.[/color]
Text.PossibleMagic.2.Desc: Uses the Flood Dragon's True Qi from within to expel scorching heat. \n[color=#FF0000]Must be mature to do so.[/color]
Text.PossibleMagic.3.Desc: Display your incredible might before an Agency to increase Stability. [color=#FF0000]Requires 100 Intelligence to unlock.[/color]

Text.Name: LsPhoenix
Text.PossibleMagic.0.Desc: Heals a Disciple's Frostbite. Only useable via a pet's behavior, can't be used manually.
Text.PossibleMagic.1.Desc: Uses the Phoenix's True Qi from within to expel bitter cold. \n[color=#FF0000]Must be mature to do so.[/color]
Text.PossibleMagic.2.Desc: Grant Piercing Sight to an Inner Disciple so that they will be able to see through to an Item's true features while at an Auction. \n[color=#FF0000]Requires 50 Intelligence to unlock. [/color]
Text.PossibleMagic.3.Desc: Display your incredible might before an Agency to increase our side's Appeal. [color=#FF0000]Requires 100 Intelligence to unlock.[/color]
